entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
